name: Avoid Programs with a very low comment/code ratio (EGL)
description: This rule searches for the programs having a low comment/code ratio. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output: This report provides the following information: PROGRAM full name, Comment Code ratio
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the artifact
reference: Standard suggestions based on CAST Quality Model
remediation: Try to always have programs with line of 80 characteres.
alternativeName: Avoid Programs with a very low comment/code ratio (EGL)
